verses.text: Then Darius the king made a decree , and search was made in the house of the rolls , where the treasures were laid up in Babylon.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft rolls: Chaldee, books\f*\f + \fr 6.1 \ft laid up: Chaldee, made to descend\f*

And there was found at Achmetha , in the palace that \add is\add* in the province of the Medes , a roll , and therein \add was\add* a record thus written : \f + \fr 6.2 \ft Achmetha: or, Ecbatana, or, in a coffer\f*

In the first year of Cyrus the king \add the same\add* Cyrus the king made a decree \add concerning\add* the house of God at Jerusalem , Let the house be builded , the place where they offered sacrifices , and let the foundations thereof be strongly laid ; the height thereof threescore cubits , \add and\add* the breadth thereof threescore cubits ;
\add With\add* three rows of great stones , and a row of new timber : and let the expenses be given out of the king’s house :

And also let the golden and silver vessels of the house of God , which Nebuchadnezzar took forth out of the temple which \add is\add* at Jerusalem , and brought unto Babylon , be restored , and brought again unto the temple which \add is\add* at Jerusalem , \add every one\add* to his place , and place \add them\add* in the house of God.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft brought again: Chaldee, go\f*

Now \add therefore\add*, Tatnai , governor beyond the river , Shethar-boznai , and your companions the Apharsachites , which \add are\add* beyond the river , be ye far from thence :\f + \fr 6.6 \ft your…: Chaldee, their societies\f*
Let the work of this house of God alone ; let the governor of the Jews and the elders of the Jews build this house of God in his place.

Moreover I make a decree what ye shall do to the elders of these Jews for the building of this house of God : that of the king’s goods , \add even\add* of the tribute beyond the river , forthwith expenses be given unto these men , that they be not hindered.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft I make…: Chaldee, by me a decree is made\f*\f + \fr 6.8 \ft hindered: Chaldee, made to cease\f*

And that which they have need of , both young bullocks , and rams , and lambs , for the burnt offerings of the God of heaven , wheat , salt , wine , and oil , according to the appointment of the priests which \add are\add* at Jerusalem , let it be given them day by day without fail :
That they may offer sacrifices of sweet savours unto the God of heaven , and pray for the life of the king , and of his sons.\f + \fr 6.10 \ft of sweet…: Chaldee, of rest\f*

Also I have made a decree , that whosoever shall alter this word , let timber be pulled down from his house , and being set up , let him be hanged thereon ; and let his house be made a dunghill for this.\f + \fr 6.11 \ft let him…: Chaldee, let him be destroyed\f*

And the God that hath caused his name to dwell there destroy all kings and people , that shall put to their hand to alter \add and\add* to destroy this house of God which \add is\add* at Jerusalem. I Darius have made a decree ; let it be done with speed. \p
¶ Then Tatnai , governor on this side the river , Shethar-boznai , and their companions , according to that which Darius the king had sent , so they did speedily.

And the elders of the Jews builded , and they prospered through the prophesying of Haggai the prophet and Zechariah the son of Iddo. And they builded , and finished \add it\add*, according to the commandment of the God of Israel , and according to the commandment of Cyrus , and Darius , and Artaxerxes king of Persia.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft commandment: Chaldee, decree\f*
And this house was finished on the third day of the month Adar , which was in the sixth year of the reign of Darius the king. \p

¶ And the children of Israel , the priests , and the Levites , and the rest of the children of the captivity , kept the dedication of this house of God with joy ,\f + \fr 6.16 \ft the children of the captivity: Chaldee, the sons of the transportation\f*

And offered at the dedication of this house of God an hundred bullocks , two hundred rams , four hundred lambs ; and for a sin offering for all Israel , twelve he goats , according to the number of the tribes of Israel.

And they set the priests in their divisions , and the Levites in their courses , for the service of God , which \add is\add* at Jerusalem ; as it is written in the book of Moses.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft as it is…: Chaldee, according to the writing\f*
And the children of the captivity kept the passover upon the fourteenth \add day\add* of the first month.

For the priests and the Levites were purified together , all of them \add were\add* pure , and killed the passover for all the children of the captivity , and for their brethren the priests , and for themselves.

And the children of Israel , which were come again out of captivity , and all such as had separated themselves unto them from the filthiness of the heathen of the land , to seek the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel , did eat ,

And kept the feast of unleavened bread seven days with joy : for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had made them joyful , and turned the heart of the king of Assyria unto them, to strengthen their hands in the work of the house of God , the God of Israel.
